class VideoConversionService

Service to convert videos and obtain metadata from them.

getPlaytimeFromString

private long getPlaytimeFromString(java.lang.String outStr)
Extract playtime from ffprobe output string. Requires whitespace after last part of seconds.
Parameters:
outStr
Returns:
playtime in seconds, or -1 if not in string

Convert video in a source file into a target file while generating a thumbnail image.

targetVideo
thumb
Returns:
